analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na hetum dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naappaccayaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: na appaccayam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhatam sappaccaya sadisa

original: Nasanidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sanidassanam na hetum dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasanidassanaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassanam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca sanidassanaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na na hetum dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Narūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: narūpim na hetum dhammam paṭicca arūpī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Narūpiṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: narūpim na na hetum dhammam paṭicca arūpī na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā gaṇitakena tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nalokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokiyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca lokuttaraḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nalokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Nalokiyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na lokiyam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nalokuttaraṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na na hetum dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe avigate cattāri

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kenacid na viññeyyam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca kenacid na viññeyyaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
